name: Hydra Teeth
description: The teeth of the Hydra are as sharp as needles, explaining the damage of the monster's bite.

name: Healing Pills
description: This bottle of pills is guaranteed to be 'good for what ails you.'

name: Health Potion
description: This potion of healing will fully restore your health. It's rather expensive, but probably worth it.

name: King's Ring
description: This is the ring that was worn by the last king of Silmaria.

name: Peace Statue
description: While this statue doesn't seem to be all that valuable, it is obviously an important symbol of peace.

name: Chocolate Box
description: This candy has the odor of over-ripe fruit.

name: Bead Necklace
description: This pretty shell necklace was made with care.

name: Amulet of Defense
description: This amulet practically glows with magic. It could prove very useful.

name: Drachmas
description: The gold coin seems to be the only money used in Silmaria.

name: Acme Tool Kit
description: Your ever-ready thief kit is your 'key' item. It will lick any lock and trick any trap, if you use it properly.

name: Interesting Toolkit
description: This small box is filled with neatly organized lockpicks and tools.

name: Jewelry
description: This jewelry is attractive and would make a nice gift for the right person.

name: Magic Wood
description: This wood has the magic of the pixies' dance and the dryads' song flowing through it.

name: Bow
description: This bow is sturdy and made of yew, too.

name: Chain Mail
description: The chain mail makes a good armor against most weapons.

name: Deed
description: This is the deed to the property now called 'Gnome Ann's Land Inn.'

name: Set of Magic Seeds
description: These seeds resemble the ordinary garden variety, but they feel more lively somehow.

name: Sheet
description: This looks like the sheet Ann put on your bed at the inn, only cleaner.

name: Hippocrene Water
description: The water of the Hippocrene has an exciting smell to it. Reminds you a little of a sunny dawn after a winter's blizzard, when all the world glistens and sparkles with icy diamonds.

name: Magic Shield
description: This magical shield has an unyielding surface to repel weapon blows.

name: Shield
description: This shield will block the blows of many weapons -- if you remember to use it occasionally.

name: Dagger
description: This dagger is a good throwing weapon. It's not as effective for close combat because you have to move within your opponent's attack range to use it.

name: Helm
description: The helm is designed to keep the head from being split like a watermelon.

name: Leather Armor
description: Leather armor is light-weight. It allows stealthy movement, but doesn't protect well against heavy weapon blows.

name: Magic Chain Mail
description: This magical armor is lighter than normal chain mail, but will protect against any weapon blow.

name: Magic Leather Armor
description: This leather is as light as silk and as soft as fine suede, but it has the magic to resist the bite of a blade.

name: Magic Helm
description: This magical helm will protect you from those 'splitting headaches.'

name: Magic Dagger
description: This dagger has an edge of tempered steel and the bite of battle magic.

name: Poisoned Dagger
description: The sickly green oil on this blade raises the hair on your neck with its foulness.

name: Slasher Dagger
description: The Slasher Dagger is swift and deadly. It pulses in your hand like the arterial blood it longs to drink.

name: Magic Bow
description: This magical bow bends like a willow branch, but sends arrows flying like a hurricane wind.

name: Dragon Slayer Sword
description: This Dragon Slayer Sword looks deadly sharp and gleams with magic. The touch of its hilt is chilling as if the weapon itself yearns for battle and the taste of blood.

name: Ice Diamond Sword
description: The Ice Diamond is light-weight and very maneuverable. It is also cold to the touch and as sharp as your breath on a winter's morning.

name: Magic Spear
description: This spear has the soul of a serpent seeking to strike.

name: Spear
description: This spear can be used in close combat, even underwater.

name: Throwing Spear
description: The throwing spear weighs less than a normal spear, but it makes a deadly missile.

name: Magic Sword
description: This sword has an edge sharpened by magic.

name: Sword
description: This sword is of good quality, but you have seen better.

name: Wurmbane Spear
description: The Wurmbane Spear has a sharpness that exceeds its fine beauty. Its magic is cold and deadly.

name: Paladin Sword
description: This magical sword is a symbol of honor. It mirrors the purity of the Paladin's soul.

name: Fire Proofing Potion
description: This oily liquid has a greasy, cold feel and smells a little like coconuts.

name: Mana Pills
description: These pills restore depleted magical spell casting power.

name: Magic Axe
description: This axe glows with magical power and gleams with the sharpness of its blade.

name: Trident
description: A trident makes a pretty good weapon under water.

name: Minotaur Axe
description: This huge axe is too unwieldy for a human to use, but it has the unmistakable feel of magic. It was specially designed for Minotaurs.

name: Poison Cure Pills
description: While these pills aren't the cure-all they claim, they will ward off death from poison.

name: Stamina Pills
description: These pills will pep you up when you are down.

name: Mana Potion
description: This potion completely restores a spellcaster's magical power.

name: Vitality Potion
description: This potion will give you a burst of energy when you've worn yourself out.

name: Lethe Water
description: The water of the River Lethe smells a little like warm milk and cookies. It makes you want to snuggle into a comfy bed and sleep for a long while.

name: Styx Water
description: The water of the River Styx has the coldness of utter implacability.

name: Goo
description: This sticky stuff would make great chewing gum, if it didn't taste like tar.

name: Arrowhead
description: The arrowhead has been broken from the shaft, but it could be used again to make another arrow.

name: Atlas Armband
description: This Atlas Armband has a magical feel to it, and seems very light for its size.

name: Blackbird
description: The Blackbird looks like a plain ebony statue. It is heavier than you would suspect, but it certainly doesn't seem all that valuable.

name: Blackjack
description: This blackjack will knock someone unconscious if the blow is well-placed. However, you have to be very sneaky and accurate with your weapon skill.

name: Grapnel
description: A grapnel is useful for climbing steep walls -- if you attach it to a rope first.

name: Jalapeno Pepper
description: These pungent peppers are particularly spicy.

name: Pickpocket Knife
description: This handy-dandy pickpocket knife slices, dices, and juliennes the purse right off a victim's belt, if you are stealthy.

name: Magic Grapnel
description: This magical grapnel seem to itch for the chance to grab onto something. Highly appropriate for a thief, isn't it?

name: Rope
description: This woven hemp rope has great tensile strength.

name: Rope and Grapnel
description: The rope and grapnel make climbing sheer walls far less dangerous than it would be otherwise.

name: Stealth Oil
description: This oil removes rust, lubricates locks, and squelches squeaks.

name: Black Lotus
description: This dark and lovely flower has a heavy perfume that is both enticing and vaguely unpleasant.

name: Tinderbox
description: The tinderbox contains flint, steel, and tinder for lighting fires.

name: Sigil of Ios
description: This arcane sign is the symbol of the fishing village of Ios.

name: Sigil of Keros
description: This inscribed design is a symbol of the fishing village of Keros.

name: Sigil of Paros
description: This unusually inscribed sigil is the symbol of the fishing village of Paros.

name: Sigil of Tinos
description: This is the symbol of the village of Tinos.

name: Gold Ring
description: This gold ring looks rather plain, but it is heavy enough to be of some value.

name: Magic Statue
description: This is the most repulsive thing you've ever held, but it's probably really valuable.

name: Good Luck Charm
description: This piece of jewelry is supposed to improve your luck magically.

name: Ring of Truth
description: With the Ring of Truth, you can never tell a lie, nor can you hear a lie without knowing it.

name: Brazier
description: This brazier is about the right size to cook supper or heat a small room.

name: Pegasus Feather
description: These feathers glow with a beauty that rivals moonlight.

name: Handbook of Swimming
description: The 'Handbook of How to Swim' is a good way to learn how to swim. There's an entire section devoted to 'Underwater Combat.'

name: Katta Pin
description: This magical pin given to you by the Katta people is a sign of friendship and respect.

name: Magic Charm Bracelet
description: This charm bracelet tingles to the touch with magical energy.

name: Stealth Charm
description: This charm enhances your skill at skulk and silence of sneak.

name: Map
description: This map will help you get your bearings and figure out where you are going.

name: Scroll
description: This seems to be a piece of parchment.

name: Water Breathing Amulet
description: This amulet allows you to breath water as naturally as air.

name: Lit Torch
description: Your torch is burning brightly.

name: Mystic Magnet
description: These Mystic Magnets are designed to magically draw one magnet to the other, thus teleporting the bearer.

name: Hydra Scale
description: The scales of the Hydra are sharp and hard, with an oily feel to them.

name: Rocks
description: These rocks are not very aerodynamic, but they make cheap and handy throwing weapons.

name: Torch
description: A torch can be very useful in dark places.

name: Sewn Sheet
description: Gnome Ann has done an adequate, if erratic, job of stitching up the sheet for you.

name: Key
description: This key will unlock the door to your room at the inn.

name: Beeswax
description: This beeswax is plyable and yielding to your warm touch.

name: Mug
description: This mug is an ordinary ceramic drinking vessel, not in the least bit valuable.

name: Shell
description: These pretty shells were once the homes of slimy marine gastropods.

name: Spearhead
description: This is all that remains of a once useful spear. You might be able to recycle it.

name: Fine Axe
description: This axe is made from steel and honed to a razor-sharp edge.

name: Augmentation Scroll
description: This scroll has the words 'Augmentation Proclamation' written upon it in magical script.

name: Amphora with Water
description: This water can be very refreshing when you are thirsty.

name: Shrink Spell Scroll
description: This scroll has the word 'Shrink' inscribed with magical ink.

name: Thermonuclear Scroll
description: This scroll is written on the hide of a long dead animal. It has the words 'Thermonuclear Blast' written upon it in magical notation.

name: Winged Lion Statue
description: This winged lion statue looks quite valuable.

name: Imitation Blackbird
description: This looks identical to the real Blackbird, but it feels slightly lighter.

name: Ouzo
description: This drink has the fragrance of licorice and strong alcohol.

name: Ale
description: This smells like a dark, rich beer.

name: Retsina
description: This smells like fresh cut pine trees and wine.

name: Elsa's Thief Toolkit
description: This looks like a set of complex tools.

name: Greek Coffee
description: This Greek coffee smells very strong and looks like mud.

name: Today's Special
description: You don't want to know.

name: Windproof Sheet
description: This looks like a sewn sheet that has been covered with rubbery tree sap.

name: R.I.P. Scroll
description: This scroll is labeled 'Rest in Peace Spell.'

name: Boom Spell Scroll
description: This scroll of parchment is labeled 'Boom.'

name: Juggling Lights Scroll
description: The scroll looks a little funny, but it's labeled 'Juggling Lights.'

name: Resistance Spell Scroll
description: This paper has the words 'Resistance Spell' written across the top.

name: Dazzle Spell Scroll
description: This scroll has 'Erasmus's Razzle Dazzle Spell' written on it in bright letters.

name: Zap Spell Scroll
description: The ink on this paper looks like it was made from copper. You feel your hair stand up on the nape of your neck just holding it. It reads 'Zap Spell Scroll.'

name: Fascination Spell Scroll
description: This is a fascinating spell. For some reason, you keep reading this scroll over and over. This is a fascinating spell. For some reason, you keep reading this scroll over and over. This is a fascinating spell...

name: Barbed Spear
description: This fine spear has barbs along its blade.

name: Ornate Shield
description: This hammered metal shield is fairly heavy and well designed.

name: A.& A. Pizza
description: This artichoke and anchovy pizza looks very appetizing -- assuming you like artichokes and anchovies.

name: Artichoke Pizza
description: This artichoke pizza has a nice crust and plenty of cheese and sauce to make it messy but tasty. Artichokes on pizza, however, are an acquired taste.

name: Flowers
description: These sweet-smelling flowers look like they'd make a nice gift for a friend.

name: Poison Cure Pills
description: These New, Improved, Lotus Blossom-enhanced pills are designed to cure the strongest of poisons!

name: Gyro
description: Gyros are thin slices of spicy meat laid on top of pita bread and covered with cucumber dressing and red onions. It's much tastier than it sounds.

name: Hera's Ring
description: This lovely ring is a symbol of marital love and devotion. Hera was the goddess of marriage in ancient Helena.

name: Sokolatak-ya
description: This nice container of sokolatak-ya resembles a box of chocolates in appearance, smell, and taste.

name: P.& J. Pizza
description: Man, this is one spicy pizza!

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: This well-made pizza has a crispy crust, succulent sauce, chewy cheese, and peppery pepperoni.

name: Alabaster Amphora
description: This amphora was carved from alabaster. It looks very old and valuable.

name: Amphora
description: This amphora makes a good vessel for carrying liquids of any variety.

name: Anchovies
description: These small fishes look and smell like something that would be better as bait than as sushi.

name: Arrow
description: Arrows are always useful to the person who has a bow.

name: Amulet of Attack
description: The Attack Amulet is an elegant piece of jewelry that feels magical to the touch.

name: Basket
description: This simple reed basket looks old, but well-cared for.

name: Balloon Painting
description: Wolfie has painted a lovely landscape of a floating balloon. It looks so realistic, you almost expect the balloon to float away.

name: Fruit
description: This fruit looks ripe and tasty. Remember, fruit is a nutritious supplement and significant source of fiber in your daily diet.

name: Proof of Destiny
description: This sign of Destiny seems to be a ceramic plate painted with a lyre, the favorite instrument of Apollo, the god of prophecy.

name: General's Shield
description: From the lightness of this shield, you might think it too fragile to be a good defense, but there is obviously some magic involved in its making.

name: Sigil of Naxos
description: This ceramic sigil is the symbol of the fishing village of Naxos.
